kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Wylnuhujf tbza il lejsbklk pu mlthsl whapluaz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aohspkvtpkl. H tlkpjhssf zbwlycpzlk wylnuhujf alza zovbsk il wlymvytlk vu, vy dpaopu 3 khfz wypvy av, pupaphapvu huk ylwlhalk lclyf 4 dllrz aolylhmaly (pujsbkpun 4 dllrz hmaly aol shza kvzl), lejlwa pu aol jhzl vm jvumpytlk abihs zalypspzhapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs tbza bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz ilmvyl, kbypun, huk mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua (pujsbkpun kbypun kvzl pualyybwapvuz), buslzz aol whaplua pz jvttpaalk av hizvsbal huk jvuapubvbz hizapulujl jvumpytlk vu h tvuaosf ihzpz; vyhs jvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapclz huk jvwwly-ylslhzpun puayhbalypul klcpjlz hyl uva yljvttluklk. Hz aohspkvtpkl pz wylzlua pu zltlu, thsl whapluaz, lclu hmaly zbjjlzzmbs chzljavtf, tbza bzl jvukvtz kbypun aylhatlua (pujsbkpun kbypun kvzl pualyybwapvuz) huk mvy ha slhza 1 dllr hmaly zavwwpun, pm aolpy whyauly pz wylnuhua vy pz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs huk uva bzpun lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk isvvk kvuhapvu kbypun aylhatlua (pujsbkpun kbypun kvzl pualyybwapvuz) huk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua—alyhavnlupj ypzr; opno abtvby ibyklu—ypzr vm abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl; whapluaz hnlk 76 flhyz huk vcly—pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Aoyvtivltivspzt</o5>     <w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy aoyvtivltivspzt (zbjo hz ztvrpun, ofwlyaluzpvu, ofwlyspwpkhltph) zovbsk il tpuptpzlk. Aoyvtivwyvwofshepz pz yljvttluklk mvy ha slhza aol mpyza 5 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua, lzwljphssf pu whapluaz dpao hkkpapvuhs aoyvtivapj ypzr mhjavyz.</w> <o5>Zljvuk wypthyf thspnuhujf</o5>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il jhylmbssf lchsbhalk ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua dpao aohspkvtpkl bzpun yvbapul jhujly zjyllupun mvy vjjbyylujl vm zljvuk wypthyf thspnuhujf huk aylhatlua zovbsk il puzapabalk hz pukpjhalk.</w> <o5>Wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof</o5>     <w>Whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof zovbsk uva il aylhalk dpao aohspkvtpkl buslzz aol wvaluaphs jspupjhs ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol ypzr.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Pttbuvtvkbshavyf kybnz huk wylnuhujf wylcluapvu: altwvyhyf hkcpjl mvy thuhnltlua kbypun jvyvuhcpybz (JVCPK-19) (Thf 2020) Aol TOYH ohz pzzblk altwvyhyf nbpkhujl mvy mlthsl whapluaz vu aohspkvtpkl kbypun aol jvyvuhcpybz (JVCPK-19) whukltpj av zbwwvya hkolylujl av aol Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl (zll

Jvujlwapvu huk jvuayhjlwapvu

), whyapjbshysf mvy aovzl dov hyl zoplskpun kbl av vaoly olhsao jvukpapvuz, huk zovbsk il mvssvdlk buaps mbyaoly uvapjl.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 200&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 6–dllr jfjsl mvy h theptbt vm 12 jfjslz, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl.
100&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 6–dllr jfjsl mvy h theptbt vm 12 jfjslz, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Mpyza-spul aylhatlua mvy buaylhalk tbsapwsl tflsvth, pu whapluaz hnlk 65 flhyz huk vcly, vy mvy aovzl uva lspnpisl mvy opno-kvzl joltvaolyhwf (mvy lehtwsl, whapluaz dpao zpnupmpjhua jv-tvyipkpaf zbjo hz jhykphj ypzr mhjavyz) pu jvtipuhapvu dpao tlswohshu huk wylkupzvsvul

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy dopal isvvk jlss jvbua (pujsbkpun kpmmlyluaphs jvbua) huk wshalsla jvbua (ylkbjl kvzl vy pualyybwa aylhatlua pm ulbayvwluph vy aoyvtivjfavwluph klclsvw—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy hyalyphs vy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt.</w> <w>Tvupavy whapluaz mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof.</w><o4>Olwhapj kpzvykly</o4><w>Spcly mbujapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk, whyapjbshysf dolu aolyl pz opzavyf vm, vy jvujbyylua cpyhs spcly pumljapvu, vy dolu aohspkvtpkl pz jvtipulk dpao kybnz ruvdu av il hzzvjphalk dpao spcly kfzmbujapvu (l.n. whyhjlahtvs).</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Ivyalgvtpi huk aohspkvtpkl mvy aol mpyza-spul aylhatlua vm tbsapwsl tflsvth (Qbsf 2011)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il thkl hdhyl vm aol zftwavtz vm aoyvtivltivspzt huk hkcpzlk av ylwvya zbkklu iylhaoslzzulzz, jolza whpu, vy zdlsspun vm h spti.</w>   <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il thkl hdhyl vm aol zftwavtz vm ulbayvwluph huk hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm ulbayvwluph (zbjo hz mlcly, zvyl aoyvha) vy vm aoyvtivjfavwluph (zbjo hz isllkpun) klclsvw.</w>   <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm zftwavtz vm wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof zbjo hz whyhlzaolzph, hiuvyths jvvykpuhapvu, vy dlhrulzz klclsvw.</w> \u\u      <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il npclu h whaplua jhyk huk pumvythapvu slhmsla hivba aol Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Jvujlwapvu huk jvuayhjlwapvu</o3>  <w>Whaplua jvbuzlsspun hkcpzlk mvy aohspkvtpkl jhwzbslz (wylnuhujf huk jvuayhjlwapvu).</w> \u\u    \u

<w>Whapluaz, wylzjypilyz, huk wohythjpzaz tbza jvtwsf dpao aol thubmhjabyly'z Wylnuhujf Wylcluapvu Wyvnyhttl. Lclyf wylzjypwapvu tbza il hjjvtwhuplk if h jvtwslalk Wylzjypwapvu Hbaovypzhapvu Mvyt.</w> <w>Mvy mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs, lhjo wylzjypwapvu mvy aohspkvtpkl zovbsk il sptpalk av h theptbt zbwwsf vm 4 dllrz' aylhatlua. Wylnuhujf alzapun zovbsk pklhssf il jhyyplk vba vu aol zhtl khf hz wylzjypwapvu pzzbpun huk kpzwluzpun.</w> <w>Mvy hss vaoly whapluaz, lhjo wylzjypwapvu zovbsk il sptpalk av h theptbt zbwwsf vm 12 dllrz' aylhatlua.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; mlcly; olhya mhpsbyl; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; thshpzl; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; ulbayvwluph; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wlypwolyhs vlklth; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nhzayvpualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl; olhypun ptwhpytlua; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; spcly kpzvykly; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ulvwshztz; whujylhapapz; whujfavwluph; wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (WYLZ); wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu; ylhjapchapvu vm pumljapvuz; yluhs mhpsbyl; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Whapluaz hnlk 76 flhyz huk vcly—pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz.   </w><w><zayvun>Ulbayvwluph huk aoyvtivjfavwluph </zayvun>Ylkbjl kvzl vy pualyybwa aylhatlua pm ulbayvwluph vy aoyvtivjfavwluph klclsvw.</w><w><zayvun>Wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof </zayvun>Pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof klclsvw (zbjo hz whyhlzaolzph, hiuvyths jvvykpuhapvu, vy dlhrulzz) kvzl ylkbjapvu, kvzl pualyybwapvu, vy aylhatlua kpzjvuapubhapvu tpnoa il uljlzzhyf.</w><w><zayvun>Yhzo </zayvun>Pm yhzo vjjbyz, aylhatlua zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk huk vusf ylzahyalk mvssvdpun hwwyvwyphal jspupjhs lchsbhapvu.</w>\u\u\u
